tags.p: margin: 12px 0; text-align: justify; word-wrap: break-word; word-break: break-all; line-height: 1.8; font-size: 17px; color: #333333;
tags.h1: font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.4; margin: 20px 0 15px; color: #333333;
tags.h2: font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.4; margin: 18px 0 12px; color: #333333;
tags.h3: font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.4; margin: 16px 0 10px; color: #333333;
tags.h4: font-size: 18px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.4; margin: 14px 0 8px; color: #333333;
tags.h5: font-size: 17px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.4; margin: 12px 0 6px; color: #333333;
tags.h6: font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 1.4; margin: 10px 0 4px; color: #333333;
tags.blockquote: margin: 15px 0; padding: 10px 15px; border-left: 4px solid #e6e6e6; background-color: #f9f9f9; color: #666666; font-size: 16px; line-height: 1.8;
tags.pre: background-color: #f5f5f5; padding: 15px; border-radius: 5px; overflow-x: auto; margin: 15px 0; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; color: #333333;
tags.code: background-color: #f5f5f5; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 3px; font-family: 'Consolas', 'Monaco', 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 14px; color: #e83e8c;
tags.img: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px auto; border-radius: 5px;
tags.th: border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 10px; text-align: left; background-color: #f5f5f5; font-weight: bold;

pre_code: background-color: transparent; padding: 0; font-family: 'Consolas', 'Monaco', 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 14px; color: #333333;

callout.container_style: box-sizing:border-box; max-width:100%; margin:15px 0; border-radius:12px; padding:14px 16px; font-family: Optima,'Microsoft YaHei',PingFangSC-Regular,serif; color:#333; line-height:1.8; word-break:break-word; text-align:left;
callout.content_style: display:inline-block; vertical-align:top; width:calc(100% - 30px); font-size:16px; line-height:1.8; color:#333; text-align:left;

codeblock.container_style: margin:0; padding:0 10px; font-family: Optima,'Microsoft YaHei',PingFangSC-regular,serif; font-size:16px; color:#000; line-height:1.5em; word-break:break-word; overflow-wrap:break-word; text-align:left;
codeblock.pre_style: border-radius:5px; box-shadow: rgba(0,0,0,0.55) 0px 2px 10px; text-align:left; margin:10px 0; padding:0;
codeblock.topbar_style: display:block; height:30px; width:100%; background:#282c34 url(https://files.mdnice.com/user/3441/876cad08-0422-409d-bb5a-08afec5da8ee.svg) no-repeat 10px 10px / 40px; margin-bottom:-7px; border-radius:5px;
codeblock.code_style: overflow-x:auto; padding:16px; padding-top:15px; color:#abb2bf; background:#282c34; border-radius:5px; display:block; font-family:Consolas,Monaco,Menlo,monospace; font-size:12px;
